item.title: Gamedev
item.description: Zig is actively used for game development by both hobbyists for side projects, as well as a few seriously committed individuals who do Zig game development full time. Libraries and bindings exist for most things, and general purpose engines/frameworks/ecosystems are in early stages of development. Mach engineGame engine & graphics toolkit for the future. zig-gamedevBuilding game development ecosystem for @ziglang! zero-graphicsA very minimal OpenGL ES 2.0 library for Zig Mach is for creating games, graphical applications, and desktop/mobile/web apps:
